mapper.update: create table fs_struct_${owner} ( id bigserial not null primary key, parent_id bigint not null, name text, type text default 'DIR':: text not null, ref_id text default '--':: text not null, selected boolean default false, found boolean default false )

create or replace view fs_tree_${owner} (id, parent_id, path) as ( WITH RECURSIVE tree AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id, ARRAY [name] AS fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} WHERE parent_id = 0 UNION ALL SELECT si.id, si.name, si.parent_id, sp.fpath || si.name As fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} As si JOIN tree AS sp ON (si.parent_id = sp.id) ) SELECT id, parent_id, array_to_string(fpath, '/') FROM tree)
mapper.insert: insert into fs_struct_${owner} (parent_id, name, type) values (#{parentId} , #{name} , #{type} )
mapper.delete: delete from fs_struct_${owner} where id in ( WITH RECURSIVE tree AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id, ARRAY [name] AS fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} WHERE parent_id = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT si.id, si.name, si.parent_id, sp.fpath || si.name As fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} As si JOIN tree AS sp ON (si.parent_id = sp.id) ) SELECT id FROM tree)
mapper.insert: insert into fs_struct_${owner} (parent_id, name, type, ref_id) values (#{file.parentId} , #{file.name} , #{file.type} , #{file.refId} )
mapper.sql: f.id, f.parent_id as "parentId", f.name, f.type, f.ref_id as "refId", f.selected, f.found, ft.path from fs_struct_${owner} f left outer join fs_tree_${owner} ft on f.id = ft.id

mapper.update: update fs_struct_${owner} set found = true where lower(name) like #{query} and id in ( WITH RECURSIVE tree AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id, ARRAY [name] AS fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} WHERE parent_id = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT si.id, si.name, si.parent_id, sp.fpath || si.name As fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} As si JOIN tree AS sp ON (si.parent_id = sp.id) ) SELECT id FROM tree)
mapper.delete: delete from fs_struct_${owner} where id in ( WITH RECURSIVE tree AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id, ARRAY [name] AS fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} WHERE selected = true UNION ALL SELECT si.id, si.name, si.parent_id, sp.fpath || si.name As fpath FROM fs_struct_${owner} As si JOIN tree AS sp ON (si.parent_id = sp.id) ) SELECT id FROM tree)
mapper.update: update fs_struct_${owner} set selected = (case when id = #{id} then true else false end)
